scripts.cs:check:
set -e; DOTNET_PROJECT_LIST=$(pnpm -s exec nx show projects --withTarget=restore 2>/dev/null | rg --no-config --no-line-number --color=never '^[[:alnum:]@._/-]+$' || true); DOTNET_PROJECTS=$(printf '%s
' "$DOTNET_PROJECT_LIST" | rg --no-config --no-line-number --color=never -v '^$' | paste -sd, - || true); if [ -z "$DOTNET_PROJECTS" ]; then echo '[cs:check] skipped (no .NET projects)'; exit 0; fi; pnpm exec nx run-many -t restore,build --projects="$DOTNET_PROJECTS" --parallel=4; TEST_PROJECT_LIST=$(pnpm -s exec nx show projects --withTarget=test 2>/dev/null | rg --no-config --no-line-number --color=never '^[[:alnum:]@._/-]+$' || true); DOTNET_TMP=$(mktemp); printf '%s
' "$DOTNET_PROJECT_LIST" > "$DOTNET_TMP"; DOTNET_TEST_PROJECTS=$(printf '%s
' "$TEST_PROJECT_LIST" | rg --no-config --no-line-number --color=never -Ff "$DOTNET_TMP" | paste -sd, - || true); rm -f "$DOTNET_TMP"; if [ -n "$DOTNET_TEST_PROJECTS" ]; then pnpm exec nx run-many -t test --projects="$DOTNET_TEST_PROJECTS" --parallel=4; else echo '[cs:check] skipped .NET tests (no .NET test target)'; fi
scripts.cs:check:affected:
set -e; DOTNET_PROJECT_LIST=$(pnpm -s exec nx show projects --affected --base=origin/main --withTarget=restore 2>/dev/null | rg --no-config --no-line-number --color=never '^[[:alnum:]@._/-]+$' || true); DOTNET_PROJECTS=$(printf '%s
' "$DOTNET_PROJECT_LIST" | rg --no-config --no-line-number --color=never -v '^$' | paste -sd, - || true); if [ -z "$DOTNET_PROJECTS" ]; then echo '[cs:check:affected] skipped (no affected .NET projects)'; exit 0; fi; pnpm exec nx run-many -t restore,build --projects="$DOTNET_PROJECTS" --parallel=4; TEST_PROJECT_LIST=$(pnpm -s exec nx show projects --affected --base=origin/main --withTarget=test 2>/dev/null | rg --no-config --no-line-number --color=never '^[[:alnum:]@._/-]+$' || true); DOTNET_TMP=$(mktemp); printf '%s
' "$DOTNET_PROJECT_LIST" > "$DOTNET_TMP"; DOTNET_TEST_PROJECTS=$(printf '%s
' "$TEST_PROJECT_LIST" | rg --no-config --no-line-number --color=never -Ff "$DOTNET_TMP" | paste -sd, - || true); rm -f "$DOTNET_TMP"; if [ -n "$DOTNET_TEST_PROJECTS" ]; then pnpm exec nx run-many -t test --projects="$DOTNET_TEST_PROJECTS" --parallel=4; else echo '[cs:check:affected] skipped .NET tests (no affected .NET test target)'; fi
scripts.py:check: if fd -HI -e py . --exclude .claude --exclude .cache --exclude .git --exclude .nx --exclude .venv --exclude _TMP --exclude node_modules --exclude dist --exclude build --exclude coverage --exclude test-results | grep -q .; then uv run ruff check . --config pyproject.toml && uv run ty check --project . --respect-ignore-files --force-exclude --error-on-warning --no-progress; else echo '[py:check] skipped (no Python files in workspace scope)'; fi
